subject: Officiating (Sports)
Umpires
lead_paragraph: Baseball’s effort to perform the background checks follows the federal investigation of Tim Donaghy, a former referee for the N.B.A. who is under suspicion of betting on league games.
snippet: Baseball’s effort to perform the background checks follows the federal investigation of Tim Donaghy, a former referee for the N.B.A. who is under suspicion of betting on league games.
